message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product and I think you'd really enjoy it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $130. Let me know what you think!
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. How about we split the difference and go with $115? It's a fair price for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $90? I really think that's a fair price for both of us.
Bob, I'm really trying to work with you here. I'm willing to come down to $105, but that's my final offer. If we can't agree on this price, I'll have to move on to other potential buyers.
I understand you're trying to move on to other buyers, but I'm really interested in this product. I'm willing to meet you at $95. That's as high as I'm willing to go.
Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product.  I'm willing to come down to $100. This is my final offer. Let me know if you're interested.

I appreciate your willingness to come down to $100, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $90? I'm really interested in this product and I don't want to have to look elsewhere.
